title: Implement functional sidebar navigation pages for all dashboards

requirements.text: Create a My Projects page (frontend/src/pages/MyProjects.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays all projects the student has applied to or is working on, with status indicators (Applied, In Progress, Completed), project details, and filtering options

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Student Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays all user-specific projects fetched from backend
Shows project status badges (Applied, In Progress, Completed)
Includes project title, description, and application date
Uses white text on dark background for consistency

requirements.text: Create a Skill Profile page (frontend/src/pages/SkillProfile.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays the student's skill strengths, certifications, and allows editing of skill data with save functionality

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Student Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays skill tags with strength percentages (VLSI, RTL, Embedded Systems, FPGA)
Includes editable fields for adding/removing skills
Shows certifications and educational background
Has a save button that persists changes to backend

requirements.text: Create a Mentorship page (frontend/src/pages/Mentorship.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that displays mentor messages, allows sending messages to mentors, and shows mentorship requests with status tracking

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Student Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays list of mentor messages from contact requests
Includes message composition interface with send functionality
Shows mentorship request status (Pending, Accepted, Active)
Uses white text styling consistently

requirements.text: Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/StudentSettings.tsx) for the Student Dashboard that allows students to update profile information, change notification preferences, and manage account settings

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Student Dashboard sidebar navigation
Includes editable profile fields (name, email, bio)
Has notification preference toggles
Includes save button that persists changes to backend
Uses white text on dark background

requirements.text: Create an Applicants page (frontend/src/pages/Applicants.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that displays all students who have applied to the company's projects, with skill match percentages, filtering by project, and contact functionality

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Industry Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays student applicant cards with skill match percentages
Shows skill tags for each applicant (VLSI, RTL, Embedded Systems, FPGA)
Includes filter dropdown to view applicants by specific project
Has contact/message button for each applicant

requirements.text: Create an Analytics page (frontend/src/pages/IndustryAnalytics.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that displays project performance metrics, applicant statistics, engagement rates, and growth charts for the company's posted projects

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Industry Dashboard sidebar navigation
Shows total applicants count across all projects
Displays active projects count
Includes engagement rate percentage metric
Has growth chart visualization placeholder
Uses white text for all labels and metrics

requirements.text: Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/IndustrySettings.tsx) for the Industry Dashboard that allows industry partners to update company profile information, manage team members, and configure posting preferences

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Industry Dashboard sidebar navigation
Includes editable company profile fields (company name, description, contact info)
Has save button that persists changes to backend
Uses white text styling consistently
Includes sections for team management and preferences

requirements.text: Create a Users page (frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays all registered users (students, industry partners, admins) with filtering, search functionality, and user management actions

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Admin Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays user list with role badges (Student, Industry Partner, Admin)
Includes search functionality to find users by name or email
Has filter dropdown to view users by role
Shows user registration dates and status
Uses white text on dark background

requirements.text: Create a Projects page (frontend/src/pages/AdminProjects.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays all projects posted on the platform with approval status, moderation tools, and analytics

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Admin Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays all projects with status badges (Pending, Approved, Rejected)
Shows project details including company name, title, and application count
Includes approve/reject action buttons for pending projects
Has filtering by project status
Uses white text styling consistently

requirements.text: Create a Revenue page (frontend/src/pages/Revenue.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays platform revenue metrics, subscription data, payment history, and financial growth charts

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Admin Dashboard sidebar navigation
Shows total revenue generated metric
Displays monthly revenue breakdown
Includes subscription tier statistics
Has revenue growth chart placeholder

requirements.text: Create a Reports page (frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that displays platform activity reports, user engagement metrics, and export functionality for generating custom reports

acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible via Admin Dashboard sidebar navigation
Displays recent activity feed with user actions and timestamps

Includes date range selector for custom report periods
Has export button to download report data

requirements.text: Create a Settings page (frontend/src/pages/AdminSettings.tsx) for the Admin Dashboard that allows admins to configure platform settings, manage access controls, and update system preferences

Includes platform configuration options

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx to replace the hardcoded sidebar links with proper React Router Link components that navigate to /student/my-projects, /student/skill-profile, /student/mentorship, and /student/settings

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar navigation items use React Router Link components
Clicking 'My Projects' navigates to /student/my-projects
Clicking 'Skill Profile' navigates to /student/skill-profile
Clicking 'Mentorship' navigates to /student/mentorship
Clicking 'Settings' navigates to /student/settings
Active route is highlighted in the sidebar

Clicking 'Applicants' navigates to /industry/applicants
Clicking 'Analytics' navigates to /industry/analytics

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx to replace the hardcoded sidebar links with proper React Router Link components that navigate to /admin/users, /admin/projects, /admin/revenue, and /admin/reports, and /admin/settings

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar navigation items use React Router Link components
Clicking 'Users' navigates to /admin/users
Clicking 'Projects' navigates to /admin/projects
Clicking 'Revenue' navigates to /admin/revenue
Clicking 'Reports' navigates to /admin/reports
Clicking 'Settings' navigates to /admin/settings
Active route is highlighted in the sidebar

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/App.tsx to add route definitions for all new dashboard pages including student routes (/student/my-projects, /student/skill-profile, /student/mentorship, /student/settings), industry routes (/industry/applicants, /industry/analytics, /industry/settings), and admin routes (/admin/users, /admin/projects, /admin/revenue, /admin/reports, /admin/settings) with proper ProtectedRoute guards

quotes: make work all the options like wise 4th version

acceptanceCriteria: All student sub-routes are registered with 'student' role protection
All industry sub-routes are registered with 'industryPartner' role protection
All admin sub-routes are registered with 'admin' role protection
Routes use lazy loading for page components
Navigation between routes works correctly

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Do not change the backend single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Maintain white text color scheme consistently across all new pages
Use the existing dark blue professional startup theme from Tailwind configuration
Preserve existing authentication and role-based access control logic
nonGoals: Modifying the backend data models or storage structure
Changing the Internet Identity authentication flow
Adding new user roles beyond student, industryPartner, and admin
